key_points: Prince Harry has signed a $20 million deal with Penguin Random House for his memoirs, initially believed to be about his own life.
The deal is now revealed to be a multi-book deal including both Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.
Harry and Meghan are working on a book together about "leadership and philanthropy."
Meghan Markle is rumored to be working on a memoir of her own and a book on "wellness."
Contrary to reports, only one book by Harry is scheduled to be released in late 2022, not split into two parts.
Harry aims to share his journey, hoping to highlight shared human experiences and lessons learned.
A source suggests Meghan Markle might write a memoir, hinting at her political aspirations.
Meghan has recently given birth to her second child, Lilibet Diana, and previously published a childrenâ€™s book titled 'The Bench'.
The children's book 'The Bench' is described by Meghan as a love letter to her husband and son, depicting tender aspects of masculinity.
The four-book deal with Penguin Random House does not include Meghan's previously published children's book.
